info.title: VoltView API
info.description:
The VoltView API provides comprehensive energy monitoring and management capabilities for multi-site businesses, enabling real-time tracking of energy consumption, cost analysis, and environmental impact metrics.

Our API suite includes:
- Site Management API - Manage and monitor multiple site locations
- Energy Consumption API - Access detailed energy usage data
- Cost Analysis API - Track and analyse energy costs
- Environmental Metrics API - Monitor carbon emissions and energy efficiency
- Bill Validation API - Validate and audit utility bills for accuracy
- Supplier Integration API - Integrate with utility suppliers for automated data collection

## Getting started guide

To start using the VoltView API, you need to:

- Sign up for a VoltView account to receive your API credentials
- Review our data granularity options (hourly/daily/monthly)
- Ensure your requests are sent via HTTPS
- All responses are returned in JSON format

## Authentication

### JWT Authentication
- Generate a JWT token using your API credentials
- Include the token in the Authorisation header
- Tokens expire after 24 hours
- Invalid tokens return a 401 Unauthorised response

### Authentication error response
If authentication fails, you will receive an HTTP 401 Unauthorised response with a detailed error message in the JSON response body.

## Data Units
- Energy Consumption: kWh
- Power Demand: kW
- Carbon Emissions: kg CO2e/tonnes CO2e
- Currency: GBP (£)
- Time Series: ISO 8601 format
- Numeric Values: Rounded to 2 decimal places

post.description:
Uploads and processes a UK energy supplier invoice (PDF or images) to extract invoice details, supply points (MPANs/MPRNs), and associated consumption and charge information.

⚠️ **Note:** Due to a current limitation in Mintlify's UI, file uploads through the 'Try It' button may not work correctly. Please use Postman or curl for testing file uploads.

files.description: Either a single PDF file or one or more image files (JPEG/JPG, PNG) containing the invoice document. Multiple images will be combined into a single PDF.

value.message: The uploaded file exceeds the size limit of 32MB.
Files must be uploaded using the field name "files".

example.error: Failed to extract data from PDF

post.description:
Upload and process a UK energy supplier contract (PDF or images) to extract contract details, supply points (MPANs/MPRNs), and associated tariff information.

⚠️ **Note:** Due to a current limitation in Mintlify's UI, file uploads through the 'Try It' button may not work correctly. Please use Postman or curl for testing file uploads.

file.description: Contract file to upload (PDF, JPEG, or PNG format)

value.message: Only PDF, JPEG, and PNG files are supported
Upload either one PDF or one or more images, but not both types together
Only one PDF file is allowed per request
The uploaded file exceeds the size limit of 32MB.

example.error: Failed to process the document. Please try again.

post.description: Validate a previously parsed invoice against meter readings, tariff data, and site information to identify discrepancies in consumption, rates, charges, and billing details

invoiceId.description: Unique invoice identifier returned from the parseInvoice endpoint

lookback.name: lookback
lookback.description: Time period to look back (e.g. 1d, 1w, 1m, 1y for day, week, month, year)

mpan.description: Meter Point Administration Number for electricity

mprn.description: Meter Point Reference Number for gas

previousEmissions.description: Previous period emissions in kg CO2e

daysOfWeek.description: Days of the week this rate applies

documentId.description: Unique identifier for the validated document in the system

invoiceId.description: Unique invoice identifier generated by the system

customerName.description: Name of the customer on the invoice

mpanMprn.description: MPAN (13 digits) for electricity or MPRN (6-11 digits) for gas

siteAddress.description: Site address where meter is located

paymentMethod.description: Method of payment for this invoice

standingCharge.description: Standing charge amount in pence per day

cclRate.description: Climate Change Levy rate in p/kWh

consumption.description: Total consumption in kWh (null if day/night rates apply)

unitRate.description: Single rate tariff in p/kWh (null if day/night rates apply)

totalUnitCharge.description: Total charge for units consumed in £

capacityCharge.description: Total capacity charge in £ (for electricity only)

amountDueNetOfVat.description: Total amount due before VAT in £

totalAmount.description: Total invoice amount including VAT in £

expiryDate.description: Optional expiration date for account credentials

contractId.description: Unique contract identifier generated by the system

customerName.description: Name of the customer on the contract

isFixedContract.description: Whether the contract has fixed rates

isMarketRates.description: Whether rates follow wholesale market prices

isMicroBusiness.description: Whether the customer is classified as a micro business

contractTermMonths.description: Duration of the contract in months

cclRate.description: Climate Change Levy rate in p/kWh

mpanMprn.description: MPAN (13 digits) for electricity or MPRN (6-11 digits) for gas

siteName.description: Name or identifier of the site

siteAddress.description: Full address of the supply point

standingCharge.description: Standing charge amount in £ per day

unitRate.description: Single rate tariff in p/kWh (null if day/night rates apply)

maximumImportCapacity.description: Maximum import capacity in kVA (for electricity only)

capacityRate.description: Capacity charge in p/kVA per day (for electricity only)

brokerName.description: Name of the broker if contract was arranged through one

brokerUplift.description: Broker's uplift in p/kWh if specified

supplyPoints.description: Details of individual meters covered by this contract, each with their specific terms and rates

extension.description: File extension of the invoice document

cclRate.description: Climate Change Levy rate in p/kWh

supplyPoints.description: List of supply points in the contract

isFixedContract.description: Whether the contract has fixed rates

isMarketRates.description: Whether the contract has variable market rates

isMicroBusiness.description: Whether the customer is classified as a micro-business

contractTermMonths.description: Duration of the contract in months

standingCharge.description: Standing charge in pence per day

unitRate.description: Unit rate in p/kWh (for single-rate tariffs)

dayUnitRate.description: Day/peak unit rate in p/kWh (for dual-rate tariffs)

nightUnitRate.description: Night/off-peak unit rate in p/kWh (for dual-rate tariffs)

correctionFactor.description: Correction factor applied to gas consumption

readFromDate.description: Date of the previous meter reading (YYYY-MM-DD)

readToDate.description: Date of the current meter reading (YYYY-MM-DD)

chargeStartDate.description: Start date of the billing period (YYYY-MM-DD)

chargeEndDate.description: End date of the billing period (YYYY-MM-DD)

paymentMethod.description: Method of payment specified on the invoice

cclRate.description: Climate Change Levy rate in p/kWh

confidence.description: Confidence level in the extracted data (0-100)

supplyPoints.description: List of supply points in the invoice

electricity.description: Emissions from electricity consumption in kg CO2e

gas.description: Emissions from gas consumption in kg CO2e

other.description: Emissions from other sources in kg CO2e

emissions.description: Emissions in the period in kg CO2e

carbonSavings.description: Carbon savings compared to baseline in kg CO2e

start.description: Start time of low carbon window

end.description: End time of low carbon window

intensity.description: Average carbon intensity during window in gCO2/kWh
